sub-categories: Bread, including garlic bread and other bread with add-ins, such as raisins, olives and cheese, but excluding sweet quick-type bread

Heavy weight cake: 10 g or more per 2.5 cm cube, such as cheesecake, pineapple upside-down, cake with at least 35% of the finished weight as fruit, nuts, or vegetables, or any of these combined, pound cake

Medium weight cake: 4 g or more per 2.5 cm cube but less than 10 g per 2.5 cm cube, such as cake with or without icing or filling, cake with less than 35% of the finished weight as fruit, nuts or vegetables or any of these combined; light weight cake with icing; Boston cream pie, cupcakes, eclairs, or cream puffs, individually wrapped snack cakes such as Swiss rolls.
Light weight cake: less than 4 g per 2.5 cm cube, such as angel food, chiffon, or sponge cake without icing or filling
